metadata.title: CVE-2021-20190 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in jackson-databind before 2.9.10.7. FasterXML mishandlesthe interaction between serialization gadgets and typing. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity aswell as system availability.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
